name: wonderful weather we're having
description:
hey i made a short game (emphasis on short, it's just a boss battle).  I've been toying with the idea of making a game for a while, and I figured, why not give it a try.

it's more of a demo if anything - but i was able to make a lil dialogue system and battle system that's real nifty.  

THE PLOT:

our main villain, the weatherman, has been using a magic wand to manipulate the weather in the surrounding area for nefarious purposes.  take control of turtle, and see if you can defeat this villain with your signature moves!

the villain takes 5 hits - defeat him and claim your reward.  good luck, gamer.  i salute you
